phrases.usage: Explain a persistent visual defect where the display flashes or blinks unexpectedly.
phrases.example: The screen keeps flickering because there is a loose connection inside, so I cannot complete my work.

phrases.usage: Provide a specific timeline for when the technical malfunction first occurred.
phrases.example: It started yesterday after the system update, so I suspect the software is currently incompatible.

phrases.usage: Describe a situation where the device loses power at an abnormal rate during use.
phrases.example: The battery drains quickly because the internal cells are degraded, so I need to replace it as soon as possible.

phrases.usage: Indicate that the device has power while transitioning to explain a primary functional failure.
phrases.example: It turns on, but the display remains black because the graphics card is malfunctioning.

phrases.usage: Request a preliminary calculation of the total expenses for parts and labor.
phrases.example: Can you estimate the cost of the maintenance because I need to approve the budget before you begin?

phrases.text: How long will the repair take?
phrases.usage: Inquire about the duration required to finish the technical service.
phrases.example: How long will the repair take because I am traveling next week and require my device for the trip?

phrases.text: So I can pick it up on...
phrases.usage: Confirm the scheduled date for collection once the repair plan is finalized.
phrases.example: So I can pick it up on Thursday afternoon because I will be leaving the office early that day.

keyVocabulary.definition: A failure to function in a normal or satisfactory manner.
A preliminary calculation of the likely cost or duration of a service.
A formal guarantee from a manufacturer to repair a faulty product within a set period.
An individual part or element that makes up a larger electronic system.
The act of providing a new part or device to take the place of one that is damaged.
